snippet: Tweaks, not major reforms, are what might emerge after some of the most important people in college sports met in Manhattan.
abstract: Greg Bishop On College Sports column analyzes meeting between athletic directors, administrators and NCAA officials in Manhattan, saying talks seemed to have leaned toward rule 'tweaks' rather than major reforms.
lead_paragraph: Tweaks, not major reforms, are what might emerge after some of the most important people in college sports met in Manhattan.
